title: Forza Ronaldinho
author: VD
content_html: Both Ronaldinho and Kaká in the midfield? Yeah, I could see that working rather nicely for the rossoneri. That other team for which occasionally they play together seems to do all right.
content_text:
Both Ronaldinho and Kaká in the midfield?  Yeah, I could see that working rather nicely for the
rossoneri
.  That other team for which occasionally they play together seems to do all right.
